name: 오프로드 운전 2016 산 모험: 익스트림 운송 트럭 운전, 프로 레이서를위한 스피드 레이싱 시뮬레이터
name_original: 오프로드 운전 2016 산 모험: 익스트림 운송 트럭 운전, 프로 레이서를위한 스피드 레이싱 시뮬레이터
description:
Revive the truck driver 3d off road experience driving the cargo transporter truck with hill climb racing against time in the newest offroad driving games. This OFF ROAD DRIVING 2016 brings you exhilarating fun with hill climb racing adventure of 2016.

Play as the hill truck driver 3d powerfully steering the heavy cargo transporter truck theme, the hottest addition to off road driving games. Get ready for the best off road drive on the narrow trucker path with steep trenches on the sides. The 5 challenging levels of cargo transport require professional hill driver with advanced driving skills. In level 1, the wooden boxes with weapons have to be transported in the off road drive. Level 2 mission is to load, transport and deliver wood cargo transporter boxes filled with potatoes, corns and so on up hill. Level 3 and 4 get more challenging with dual cargo transport missions. Reaching the 5th level makes you feel like a cargo transporter city tycoon owning truck simulator wood cargo transporter business. Drive carefully on the steep and narrow paths. Keep the steering in control or you will fall down into the deep trenches. Carefully turn on the curvy pathways and look out for the boulders on the side. A bar is given so that you can monitor the damage during your hill drive. Each mission has limited time so it the hill climb racing with the combo of cargo transport trucker driving simulator.

Use your advanced trucker 3d hill climb skills for this ultimate offroad simulator 4x4 combined with cargo transport. Natural born buggy racer, Show off your offroad driving cargo transporter truck expertise & exhibit your monster truck and bus driver skills for the latest offroad driving adventure games of 2016. Experience the nonstop fun as an intense truck driver 3D offroad speed racing with ultimate Off Road Driving 2016.
